data.title: APT Tennessee East
data.meta_description: Looking for an amateur golf tournament to test your golf skills and compete against other top amateur golfers in the  area?  Join APT Tennessee East today.
data.text:
Amateur Players Tour

Amateur Golfers from the APT Tennessee East area who love tournament golf, playing great golf courses, and competing against players of their own skill level are joining the Amateur Players Tour, an elite Amateur Golf Tour.

Why our members love the APT:

Play where the pros play

Enjoy amazing camaraderie with fellow participants

Compete for season long points and qualify for the North American Championship

join the tour

Tour Schedule

We're Here To Help!

Welcome to the APT Tennessee East Chapter of the Amateur Players Tour. We are bringing a new level of professionalism to amateur tournament golf. Any questions, just ask!

Mike Wilkins

APT Tennessee East Local Chapter Owner

mikewilkins@aptgolf.org

8655563240

Send a Message

APT Testimonials

"A well-run competitive tour that lines up some great courses I might not get the chance to otherwise. Good community, good golf."

Eric Strange

St. Louis

"Great way to test your golf skills against players of similar caliber."

Steve Hasenfratz

St. Louis

"Great guys, and well run organized tournaments!"

Bradley Reynolds

Indianapolis

"Great people and great courses."

Brian Hayes

Carolina Triad

"Finally a tour that actually puts in the effort to provide their members a fantastic experience and benefits with your membership"

Jake Englebrake

Kansas City

"APT is by far the best tour I’ve played on. Brought my love of golf back. Can’t say enough about everyone who plays in it and everyone who runs it. Unreal venues and we're paid out with Visa gift cards. Great tour ran by even better people!"

Tyler F.

St. Louis | Division 1

"I've played on every am-tour in the country and nothing compares to APT. From the bigger prize purses, professional notifications, member discounts, tee box care factor, pace of play, and overall organization. Nothing comes close."

Rick P.

Charlotte | Division 2

"Great tour! Lots of great venues to play. I have played courses I would have never played had I not been on the tour. Made new lifetime friends!"

Wilson G.

Wilson-Review

one tour. all skill levels.

Players compete in golf tournaments at the local level in a season-long points race with players being divided into five divisions based upon their skill level to provide fun and fair competition. Division champions will be crowned at each event, with the winners receiving a trophy and all prize pools paid out in VISA Gift Cards. APT members will have the opportunity to play some of the best courses APT Tennessee East has to offer, while also having opportunities to play national majors at elite venues such as Big Cedar Lodge, Streamsong Resort, Chambers Bay and Bandon Dunes. Divisions are assigned based on Amateur Players Tour Tournament Index. The APT observes the USGA Rules of Golf governing competition and amateur status.

divisions for every skill level

To ensure fair play, division placement and handicaps are calculated based upon your APT tournament scores to create an APT Tournament Index.

Division 1 - 3.4 & below

Division 2 - 3.5-8.4

Division 3 - 8.5-13.4

Division 4 - 13.5-18.4

Division 5 - 18.5 & above

join the tour

Tour Schedule

Divisions for Everyone

Divisions determined by your APT Tournament Index based on APT Tournament Scores. Options for Seniors and Ladies too!

Community

Play competitive golf, have fun, and develop life-long friendships. Join our community of passionate golfers!

Awards and Prizes

Each Division winner receives a trophy, and top finishers in each Division win VISA Gift Cards. Players compete for Local and National Player of the Year honors!

Top-Rated Courses

Play the top-rated public and private courses in your area, with the ability to travel to majors at bucket-list destinations at some of the best golf resorts in North America!

Download Our App

Download our Amateur Players Tour App for FREE in your app store and get access to live scoring, schedules, stats, tour updates, and more! The easiest way to stay connected to the APT!

Tour Experience

Play tournament golf like the pros! Experience what it's like to step up onto the first tee and be treated like a pro!

Upcoming Events

No upcoming events at this time.

Join the Fastest Growing Amateur Golf Tour in America

Players have the ability to become a Folds of Honor Partner! Your membership includes everything in Player Badge plus a $75 donation to Folds of Honor; a nonprofit organization that helps provide the families of fallen and disabled service members educational scholarships. APT members partnered together to raise $100,000 for Folds of Honor in 2023!
